basics.name: Elias Marks
basics.summary: PhD Student and Research Assistant at the Center for Robotics, University of Bonn. Research in computer vision for agricultural robotics: 3D reconstruction, point cloud processing, semantic scene understanding and neural rendering.

work.position: Researcher — Computer Vision for Agricultural Robotics
work.summary: Research and development on 3D reconstruction, point cloud processing and perception methods for agricultural robotics.
Supervised MSc theses on target-aware implicit mapping and fruit tracking using high-precision point clouds.

work.position: Student Trainee — Localization, Mapping and Navigation for Service Robots
Intern — Localization, Mapping and Navigation on Single Board Computers

education.area: PhD in Computer Vision and Robotics for Agriculture
Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics
Bachelor of Engineering in Automation and Robotics
